definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4

definition: Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense (COSTIND)/abbr. to 國防科工委|国防科工委[Guo2 fang2 Ke1 Gong1 Wei3]
pinyin: Guo2 fang2 Ke1 xue2 Ji4 shu4 Gong1 ye4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 國防科學技術工業委員會

sentences.english: He teaches all liberal sciences and gives account of dead souls that died in sin.
sentences.chinese: 他各人文科學和教給到死，死在仲心靈。

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究這種超冷狀態下的科學技術統稱爲低溫學。

sentences.english: Scientists don't yet know what the effects of those reactions might be.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們還不清楚這些反應會具體產生什麼樣的結果。

sentences.english: Scientists find that hard-working people live longer than average men and women.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們發現努力工作的人比一般的人更有生活。

sentences.english: These results provided the genetic foundation for the breeding of V. volvacea.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究結果爲草菇的育種提供了科學依據。

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且幾項科學研究也表明，雞湯的確具有藥用價值。

sentences.english: A key part of the program hasbeen to commercialize outstanding health science technologies from themedical colleges.
sentences.chinese: 專業的核心是將醫學院校的生命科學技術商品化。

sentences.english: Scientists conducted genetic tests on thousands of maize seed and leaf samples.
sentences.chinese: 科學家對數千份千玉米種子和葉的樣本進行遺傳測試。

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論宏觀材料學的結構，並思考技術科學的分支。

sentences.english: The students collected a bag of bark for their science project.
sentences.chinese: 學生爲進行科學計畫蒐集了一袋樹皮。

sentences.english: He is determined to devote his life to sicence.
sentences.chinese: 他決心把畢生精力貢獻給科學事業。

sentences.english: Or have scientists been sexing up the risks and playing down the uncertainties?
sentences.chinese: 或者科學家對風險添油加醋，而貶低了不確定性？

sentences.english: Dr Mae-wan Ho, Institute of Science in Society, London, UK.
sentences.chinese: 何美芸博士，社會科學研究院，倫敦，英國。

sentences.english: Dr. Chen is a leading scientist in ecology.
sentences.chinese: 陳博士是生態學上首屈一指的科學家。

sentences.english: The scientists took tissues from fetal liver, and lymph glands .
sentences.chinese: 科學家從胎兒肝和淋巴腺獲得組織。

sentences.english: One of the most common problems for scientists was money.
sentences.chinese: 科學家面臨的最常見問題之一就是金錢。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
